title: Global mobile video traffic 2017 to 2022
summary: In general Traffic in PB per month has rose over the Year.
Traffic in PB per month is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The line significantly increased by 5230.0 from Year 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Traffic in PB per month, about 12051.0 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Traffic in PB per month about 6821.0 was reached at Year 2017
